message.content:
cs.CR, cs.GT, cs.DS, cs.NI, cs.IT 

The paper discusses the security of Bitcoin, which falls under the category of cryptography and security (cs.CR). The paper also involves probability and game theory (cs.GT), as well as data structures and algorithms (cs.DS) in computing the probability of a double spend attack. The paper also involves networking and internet architecture (cs.NI) as it discusses the confirmation process in the Bitcoin network. Finally, the paper involves information theory (cs.IT) in analyzing the security of the Bitcoin protocol.
